decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (411/P/02/03, 411/P/01/07, 411/P/01/06, 411/P/01/05, 411/P/03/03 - dated 10.08.15; Flood Risk Assessment and Design and Access Statement, dated 07 August 2015; - received 19/08/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - Any repair work to the chimney shared with No. 42 Church Street shall match the existing original chimney fabric and the proposed new gable and parapet wall on the boundary qwiht 42 Church Street shall match the brickwork at No 42 by using materials of a matching form, composition and consistency work in type, colour, texture, profile and dimensions of materials and in detailed execution.
description: Erection of a mansard roof extension with two dormers to front elevation and one to rear elevation, a single storey rear extension, and a basement extension
